name: Vespper
all_locations: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description: Vespper is an open-source AI on-call agent that automatically investigates production issues, such as incidents and alerts, and delivers detailed findings directly to Slack. It integrates with observability tools like Coralogix, DataDog and Grafana, codebases on GitHub, and internal knowledge platforms like Notion and Confluence, and manages to produce non-trivial insight about the problem that can save precious time & money.
one_liner: Troubleshoot production issues faster using an AI agent
